attributes.action: rescind the Knighthood for Salman Rushdie
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We consider him to be unworthy of a Knighthood, there are many more in this land of ours far more worthy of this honour.  He has cost us a great deal in time and money for his protection, does not reside in this country and this will ridicule us in the eyes of the world.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
